active.label: Active
active.title: Active Skill: Freezing Field
active.description:
• Chione will summon a blizzard that freezes enemy units in a target area, dealing damage to the targeted enemy units.
• The blizzard’s damage will disregard any damage reduction effect.
• Damages from other attacks (e.g. Chione’s basic attack and attacks by allied units) will observe damage reduction effect.
• Range: 8

passive.label: Passive
passive.title: Passive Skill: Frost
passive.description: • Chione will reduce enemy attack speed and movement.

legendary.label: Legendary
legendary.title: Legendary Skill: Frost Prison
legendary.description:
• After several basic attacks, Chione will release the <Frost Prison> skill which freezes targeted enemy units.
• <Frost Prison> increases damage dealt to enemy units frozen by either <Freezing Field> or <Frost Prison>.
• The damage increase applies to both basic attacks and skill damages, including damage from Voodoo Dolls’ <Destiny Bond> skill.
• Trigger Number: 3
• Range: 3
